title: 10/11/21: Jobs Report Fail, Mass Shortages, Facebook Freakout, Gifted & Talented, McConaughey, Crisis of Men, Trust Collapses, China Eyes Taiwan, and More!

itunes:title: 10/11/21: Jobs Report Fail, Mass Shortages, Facebook Freakout, Gifted & Talented, McConaughey, Crisis of Men, Trust Collapses, China Eyes Taiwan, and More!
itunes:author: Breaking Points
itunes:subtitle: Saagar and guest co-host Marshall Kosloff discuss the underwhelming September jobs report, mass shortages in the economy, the freakout over Facebook's business practices, NYC's gifted & talented program, Matthew McConaughey's political potential, a crisis of men in America, trust collapsing across the board, the brewing conflict between China and Taiwan, and more! On the Tuesday 10/12 Show, Krystal Ball will be back in her position as co-host.
